narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Dionne Coleman is a Social Worker, Clinical provider based in Towson, MD. From 2018-09 through 2019-10, this provider received $152K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 681 beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 94% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90834 (90834). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $33K in 2018 to $119K in 2019 (266% growth).
Saw a 3.7× spike in 2019 ($33K → $119K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
Billing stopped in 2019-10, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
